Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.projectkronos.controller.ClientController

  • @ExposesResourceFor(value=ClientEntity.class)
 @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/clients")
public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
